description:
In order to get back to the original, selfless Kyoko, she must participate in LME`s "love me" campaign, whereby she must help others and do good.  As this wears her out and starts to bring her down, pop idol Ruriko Matsunai at LME offers her this job: "Protect me from the sun." It seems impossible to Kyoko...will she be able to handle it?
Source: crunchyroll
